Interface GameService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public GameService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes all games permanently and should be executed on server shutdown.
      java.util.List<com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.entity.Game> getAllGames()
      Returns all currently loaded games on the server.
      <L> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.entity.Game> getGameFromLocation(L location)
      Returns the game at the given location.
      java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.entity.Game> getGameFromName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the game with the given name or displayName.
      <P> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.entity.Game> getGameFromPlayer(P player)
      Returns the game if the given player is playing a game.
      <P> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.entity.Game> getGameFromSpectatingPlayer(P player)
      Returns the game if the given player is spectating a game.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> restartGames()
      Restarts all games on the server.
